summary: The document is a declassified record associated with the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992. It details a letter concerning an Anti-Castro group, indicating operational interest by the Agency in 1960. The discussion includes the potential for a meeting to explore how the subject organization could aid another group, highlighting operational connections during that era.
key_findings: The document is part of the records released under the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992.
It references a subject organization described as an Anti-Castro group.
The writer of a letter was of operational interest to the Agency in 1960.
There was consideration of a meeting to explore assistance between groups.
